relevant_findings.general: Patient is alert and oriented x 3, no scleral icterus, dry mucous membranes.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft abdomen, non-tender/non-distended, mild mid-epigastric tenderness to palpation without rebound or guarding, normal bowel sounds.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/rubs/gallops, normal S1/S2.
relevant_findings.extremities: No clubbing, cyanosis, or edema, presence of multiple subcutaneous nodules (lipomas).
